meanings.definition: A person's usual way of behaving or the physical characteristics of a person or group.
meanings.sent1: Her habitus involves always greeting everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The habitus of the team is to work together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent3: His habitus of wearing mismatched socks always brings a chuckle to those around him.
meanings.sent4: The habitus of the bustling city was like a symphony of movement and noise.
meanings.sent5: The habitus of the forest was serene and peaceful, untouched by human presence.

meanings.definition: The physical and mental characteristics of an individual or group.
meanings.sent1: The habitus of the athlete includes strength and agility.
meanings.sent2: She studied the habitus of different bird species for her research project.
meanings.sent3: The habitus of the quirky professor always kept his students entertained.
meanings.sent4: The habitus of the old house whispered stories of generations past.
meanings.sent5: The habitus of the mountain range was majestic and awe-inspiring.
